title: Riot pls: Open Ranked Team 5v5 queue earlier on weekdays/weekends for the next month
body: With the rush of the final month of ranked ladder setting in, alot of people are frantically trying to get ranked teams together to get the ranked rewards before the queues close for the year. Having the queue time restricted to 7pm during the week is a real kicker as well as 5pm on weekends, especially since now more than ever the queues will be more populated.
